belongs_to_collection.name: Treasure Island Media's L.U.S.T. (Lost Unreleased Sex Tapes) Collection

overview: Deep in the Treasure Island Media video vault were found several hard drives that had a ton of unreleased footage on them. You won't believe what was unearthed and never released — until now – newly edited and remastered! Lost Unreleased Sex Tapes is a lost moment in sexual time and Treasure Island Media history. Each scene is a gem. Many of these guys stopped doing porn, some moved away, and some we still work with today. Volume 1 features many All-Star Hall-Of-Fame exclusives (including Dawson, Derek Anthony, Christian, Dan Fisk, Brad McGuire, James Roscoe, and Jerry Stearns), some favorites over the years (including Ben Archer, Jonas, Tom McCarthy, Jacob Scott, and Matt Walker), and many, many more.
title: L.U.S.T. (Lost Unreleased Sex Tapes) 1
